name: hackers-tiny-slide-deck
description: Turn a Markdown document into a slide deck quickly.
author: Tuomas Kareinen <tkareine@gmail.com>

scripts.example:publish: git checkout master && git checkout -B tmp-gh-pages && npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production npm run lib:build && npm run example:build && git add -f build && git commit -m 'Generated example' && git subtree split --prefix build -b gh-pages && git push -f origin gh-pages && git branch -D gh-pages && git checkout master
scripts.lib:diffBuild: bash -c 'diff -u -- <(git show origin/gh-pages:htsd.min.js | prettier --parser babel) <(prettier --parser babel build/htsd.min.js)'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm test && NODE_ENV=production npm run lib:build
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration:ci
scripts.test:integration:build: mkdir -p build/test && for f in test/fixture/*.md; do marked -i "$f" > "build/test/$(basename -s .md "$f").html"; done
scripts.test:integration:ci: npm run test:integration:build && NODE_ENV=production start-server-and-test lib:serve 'http-get://localhost:8080' test:integration:run
